doc.field: Series II: Financial, Administrative, and Legal
Series II: Financial, Administrative, and Legal

This series contains all financial, administrative and legal papers from Sterling Lord and the Sterling Lord Literistic Agency. Subseries A, the administrative and legal files, contain contracts, personnel files, and other material relating to the administration of the agency. Subseries B, the financial files, contains bank statements, cancelled checks, royalty statements, budget reports, and all other financial material.
